name: Hello, I'm Austin.
description:
Version 1.1 Update: Title Page changes and slight journal entry changes

This game was specifically made for an in-class Arcade and Critique. It is a personal journal that allows me to open up to my classmates about my struggles and success in life. Inspired by the openness of others in the class, I wanted to break out of my comfort zone and try producing something personal as well. If you are interested in playing, feel free to, I just wanted to supply some context to the game. I hope you enjoy and find meaning out of this game. 

It plays as a choose-your-own-adventure, text based game, with choices intended to simulate interactions between the journal and the reader.
